title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap! This stunning teal-colored mat is the perfect companion for your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercise routines.

With dimensions of 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this mat provides ample space for you to stretch, move, and flow. The 2/5 inch thickness offers exceptional comfort and support, allowing you to enjoy your practice to the fullest.

Crafted from high-quality NBR foam, this mat is not only durable but also incredibly soft and cushioned. Say goodbye to uncomfortable sessions and hello to a blissful experience on your new Gaiam mat.

Weighing just 3.11 pounds, this mat is lightweight and easy to carry around. But that's not all - it comes with an included Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, making it a breeze to transport and store. No more struggling with bulky mats or forgetting your mat at home.

The Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat is designed for those who seek extra thickness, soft cushioning, and convenience. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned yogi, this mat is a must-have for your fitness journey.

Elevate your practice with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat. Get yours now and experience the ultimate comfort and convenience during your workouts.
